title: #191: Stalking: Taking Back Control - With Lenora Claire at CrimeCon 2019
description:
Live from CrimeCon, New Orleans, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti discuss stalking with our special guest Lenora Claire. Lenora was dubbed the "Erin Brockovich of stalking" by Vice having been targeted by serial stalker, Justin Massler who changed his name to Cloud Starchaser, for 8 years. As well as stalking Lenora, Cloud Starchaser stalked Ivanka Trump, Gwyneth Paltrow and several of the Kardashians. 

Lenora refused to be a victim and became her own advocate and investigator, tracking the stalker, collecting evidence and undertook her own discovery in the case resulting in the stalker being convicted. This episode is a must listen.

#TakeStalkingSeriously

#HerNameISLenoraClaire
